title: Stylish Coogee Beach Self-Contained Apartment Escape near Sydney CBD
description: Explore one of Sydneyâ€™s most charming beachside suburbs with a stay at the stylish Adina Apartment Hotel Coogee Sydney, a collection of contemporary self-contained apartments only a short drive from the CBD. With laidback Coogee Beach on your doorstep, indulge in coastal walks or leisurely morning swims, before grabbing a bite at one of the local eateries scattered along the beachfront. After a long day, relax and rejuvenate in your self-contained apartment, complete with everything you need for a fun-filled family holiday or romantic escape.
offer_address: 183 Coogee Bay Road, Coogee New South Wales 2034, Australia
